title.rendered: Lead Machines: Features of Highly-Effective Real Estate Websites

content.rendered:
Learn to Make Online Consumers Happy and Get More Website Leads

Chances are your website is leaving money on the table by failing to maximize the amount of leads it attracts and captures. In this educational webinar recording, senior sales coaches Joyce Juntunen and Sheldon Rapoza delve into the features of highly-effective real estate websites. You’ll learn about everything from the helpful tools that cause consumers to flock to top-performing agents’ websites to the wide array of information the best of these websites capture for the many leads they generate.

Watch this webinar recording to learn about:

  • Understanding today’s consumer
  • Common mistakes found on the average agent’s website
  • Website must-haves for online consumers
  • Why having a great website is so important

Need More Leads?

With Market Leader, you can tap into two sources of a guaranteed number of exclusive buyer and seller leads. These leads are more than just impressions – you can get a steady stream of buyers and sellers delivered directly to you. Check lead availability in your desired ZIP codes today!

Check Lead Availability
